snippet: According to the Commerce Department, stockpiles held by wholesale businesses rose 0.3 percent in January and sales fell 3.1 percent in January, following a 0.9 percent decline in December.
lead_paragraph: According to the Commerce Department, stockpiles held by wholesale businesses rose 0.3 percent in January and sales fell 3.1 percent in January, following a 0.9 percent decline in December.

headline.main: Wholesale Stockpiles Rise Slightly, and Sales Fall
headline.print_headline: Wholesale Stockpiles Rise Slightly, And Sales Fall
